short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated Google forms filling using genai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
docFiller transforms your Google Forms experience by seamlessly integrating AI to automate and enhance form completion. With support for various field types and leading AI models, docFiller makes filling out forms faster and more accurate than ever before.

Key Features :
• Complete support for 20+ Google Forms field types
• Integration with leading AI models:
    ChatGPT
    Claude
    Gemini
    Ollama
    Mistral
• Real-time form analysis and completion
• Simple API key setup

How It Works :
1. Install the extension.
2. Choose your preferred profile and consensus weights. If not using a specific AI, reset its weight to 0.
3. Add your preferred AI provider’s API key.
4. Navigate to any Google Form.
5. Let docFiller handle the rest.

✨ Special Mentions
• Codon Profile:
Codon makes docFiller feel like magic! It intelligently adapts itself to any form, crafting the best answers tailored specifically to your needs.

• Chrome AI:
Chrome AI is a built-in AI for Chrome, designed to work even offline. Currently in its early program phase.
→ You need to set it up before using it in docFiller. Follow this guide to get started: Chrome AI Setup(https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VG8HIyz361zGduWgNG7R_R8Xkv0OOJ8b5C9QKeCjU0c/edit?usp=sharing)

Perfect For
• Survey participation
• Research responses
• Questionnaire completion
• Form testing
• Data collection

Note: API key from your chosen AI service provider required for operation.
